allow: Bash(# Remove the conclusion file from week 4 that''s not in the sidebar rm ""docs/weeks/week-4/4-5-week-4-conclusion.md"" || echo ""4-5-week-4-conclusion.md not found in week-4"" # Check other weeks for similar conclusion files that might not be in sidebars for i in {5..10}; do ls docs/weeks/week-$i/)
Bash(echo "No conclusion file found in week-$i" done)
